name: mapp/intelligence
description: Add your Mapp Intelligence account ID and start tracking. The plugin adds the tracking script and data layer for your customer insights dashboard automatically.

description.de-DE: Geben Sie Ihre Mapp Intelligence-Konto-ID an und starten Sie das Tracking. Das Plugin fügt das Tracking-Skript und den Data Layer für Ihr Customer Insights-Dashboard automatisch hinzu.
description.en-GB: Add your Mapp Intelligence account ID and start tracking. The plugin adds the tracking script and data layer for your customer insights dashboard automatically.
